stemmer.rslp

Class RSLPAutomata

  • java.lang.Object
    • stemmer.rslp.RSLPAutomata

  • public class RSLPAutomata
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the RSLP algorithm in the automata based version described in the Assessing the Efficiency of Suffix Stripping Approaches for Portuguese Stemming
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Wadson Ferreira

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean KEEP_ACCENTS
      Constant to inform that IS NOT to remove accents from the processed word
      static boolean REMOVE_ACCENTS
      Constant to inform that IS to remove accents from the processed word

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public java.lang.String apply(java.lang.String in,
                              boolean accents)
        Applies the stemming process using automatas
        Parameters:
        in - Word to be processed
        accents - Receives one of the class constant to execute or not the remove accents step
        Returns:
        Processed word. It can be the original word if none of the reductions was applied or a modificated word
